review: . "I truly appreciate the extra effort you put into making my child feel comfortable and supported. You're an amazing Dr.Jiju

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to see doctor for my kid's tooth removal. My son was so scared to go to see the doctor only. I am so thankful to doctor Jijo Jacob for making my son comfortable and he extracted the tooth. My son was very comfortable with the doctor. Doctor has lot of patience *** **** ********* ** *** ***** He explains each and every thing clearly. I haven't seen before any doctor who explains to his patients with this much of patience. I have done my braces treatment too and wisdom tooth extraction for my mom also. I am so happy with the treatment. Please continue your good work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Jaw Orthopedics,
review:
Dr Jijo Jacob is an expert in his field. He thouroughly checks the teeth, explains the problem and narrates what is to be done.

He is a doctor who has enough time for the patient and simply not making the patient to just sit and then start the job.

I did Root Canal Treatment for two of my teeth and crown fixing. One of teeth which is a last but one Molar of lower jaw was having a big cavity and was really difficult to carry RCT, but to my surprise he did it with ease. Hats off for the great effort , otherwise I would have lost that tooth had I gone elsewhere.

One of the best things I would like to share is that he is a man who is not after money , his charges for treatment are reasonably low.

It is a true feedback I am giving so that people can drop into his clinic without any doubt in his treatment and his charges.

The only thing people have to do is to reconfirm from him the appointment timing before they start from their place of living to minimise waiting time at the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Indeed,  My experience was amazing the most treasured of the Doctors I have been privileged to meet. Dr. Jijo Jacob sir and Dr. Vikas sir treated me as if I was a family member during all my meetings with them. Everything was well explained  I had no reluctance to ask for what I needed. On top of that my medical outcome is undoubtedly successful, and the results were as described. If they weren't specialized, I'd see them for everything!. I would recommend Shalom Dental Clinic & Cosmetics Center ( Dr. Jijo Jacob sir and Dr. Vikas sir ) to everyone who needs Oral related treatment. "I am very much thankful to them"...ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ¤—

review: I highly recommend Dr. Jijo for his exceptional care. His meticulous attention to detail, friendly demeanor, and thorough diagnosis made my toothache experience much easier. review:
I thank God for helping me out to get a good friendly Doctor Jijo Jacob & Dr Genne. 
Shalom Dental Clinic 



 Who is a very Caring and loving person and a good soft speaking person, he can speak six laungages.
  I had got tooth Ache from a month and I was only taking a Pain killer tablet but my prayers was heard and just passing tru Sahakarngr behind Hanuman temple and More mega store 
He explained me and Started RCT treatment and in 3visit my Tooth ache is completely gone and he Charged a minimum amount  for his good service,    I am  really happy to recommend to all my loving Bangaloreans to visit his Clinic for any tooth related problem. 

Thanking you 
May God Bless You.
I would really recommend anyone to go to him for Dental checkup, doctor really listened to everything that I had say and explained me very politely and briefly. Thank you sir !!
